vulnerability.name: USN-4049-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4049-1 fixed a vulnerability in GLib. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that GLib created directories and files without properly  restricting permissions. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access  sensitive information.

statements.status_notes: GLib did not properly restrict directory and file permissions. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
